name: iPhone 7
description: The Apple iPhone 7 is a smartphone that was tested with the iOS 10.0.2 operating system. This model weighs 4.8 ounces, has a 4.7 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 7-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 2GB of RAM. It was tested with 32GB of storage.

name: iPhone 8
description: The Apple iPhone 8 is a smartphone that was tested with the iOS 11 operating system. This model weighs 5.3 ounces, has a 4.7 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 7-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 2GB of RAM. It was tested with 64GB of storage.

name: Samsung Galaxy S8
description: The Samsung Galaxy S8 is a smartphone that was tested with the Android 7.0 operating system. This model weighs 5.3 ounces, has a 5.8 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 8-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 4GB of RAM. It was tested with 64GB of storage and has a memory card slot for expanded storage.

name: iPhone 6s Plus
description: The Apple iPhone 6s Plus is a smartphone that was tested with the iOS 10.1.1 operating system. This model weighs 6.7 ounces, has a 5.5 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 5-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 2GB of RAM. It was tested with 16GB of storage.

name: Google Pixel 2 XL
description: The Google Pixel 2 XL is a smartphone that was tested with the Android 8.0 operating system. This model weighs 6.2 ounces, has a 6 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 8-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 4GB of RAM. It was tested with 64GB of storage.

name: Huawei Honor 6X
description: The Huawei Honor 6X is a smartphone that was tested with the Android 6.0 operating system. This model weighs 5.9 ounces, has a 5.5 inch touch screen display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 8-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 3GB of RAM. It was tested with 32GB of storage and has a memory card slot for expanded storage.
